snippet: What actually goes into determining a player’s trade value? Talent is first and foremost, obviously, but there's also the length and worth of the player's contract, their age, their fit with the roster, their attitude towards the game, their injury history, their lifestyle off the court, and much more. That's all to say… It's actually pretty hard to measure a player's trade value. Since there is no measurable way to establish it, we decided: Why not leave it up for the people - you guys - to decide?
